page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area we have been asked to report on for this project is a mixture of urban and rural industrial and residential and both old and new housing.Well over half of the area is composed of agricultural land .The land is fertile covered mainly by good grass on which graze large dairy herds.The urban development consists of the Denton Holme area,developed first in the nineteen century but whitch in the is still changing and the Morton Park area planned in the 1950s by the city council to provide modern housing for a growing population.The council estate grew throughout the 1960s and was added to in the early 1970s when an estate of private houses was erected on the north side of the Wigton road with many of the houses being constructed to individual designs.
